title: Falkland Islands All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: To support the Falkland Islanders' right to self-determination, maintain a strong link between Parliament and the Falkland Islands, and support the Falkland Islands and their economic development.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 8671.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Richard Hyslop, Falkland Islands Government Representative to the UK and Europe . Tel: 020 7222 2542
contact_details.secretariat: Falkland Islands Government Representative to the UK and Europe acts as the group's secretariat.https://falklands.gov.fk/londonoffice/

detailed_benefits.Source: Falkland Islands Government Representative to the UK and Europe
